AIPlugin.DescriptionForModel: Help the user validate JSON or XML string. You can validate format or validate it against provided schema or provided sample object.
AIPlugin.DescriptionForHuman: [ChatGPT](https://openai.com/blog/chatgpt-plugins)/[Semantic Kernel](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/semantic-kernel/ai-orchestration/plugins?tabs=Csharp) plugin for validating JSONs or XMLs.
